title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", December 1935
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in gray ink, upper right: Ank. 5-Dec. 1935/R...
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on bowl: 1 b; foot: 1 b.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Round cup drawn in plan and elevation flanked by applied band with scalloped outer edge which continues down to the trapezoidal-shaped base. To the right of the base a small graphite drawing of the cup contour meeting base contour.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cup", December 1935.
December 1935. Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-24.
